00001 from molDynamics.gulp.potentials.ThreeAtomPotential import ThreeAtomPotential
00002 from os import linesep
00003 
00004 class ThreeBodyGulp(ThreeAtomPotential):
00005     '''representation of a three atom potential for gulp'''
00006     
00007     class Inventory(ThreeAtomPotential.Inventory):
00008         import pyre.inventory as inv
00009         kFit = inv.str("Fit k", default = None)
00010         kFit.meta['tip'] = "whether to change this parameter during a fitting run"
00011         kFit.validator = inv.choice([None,'True','False'])
00012         theta0Fit = inv.str("Fit theta0", default = None)
00013         theta0Fit.meta['tip'] = "whether to change this parameter during a fitting run"
00014         theta0Fit.validator = inv.choice([None,'True','False'])
00015                 
00016     def __init__(self, atom1, atom2, atom3):
00017         ThreeAtomPotential.__init__(self, atom1, atom2, atom3)
00018         self.ii=self.inventory
00019         self.ii.atom1 = atom1
00020         self.ii.atom2 = atom2
00021         self.ii.atom3 = atom3
00022 
00023             
00024     def getIfDefined(self, inventoryItem):
00025         if inventoryItem==None:
00026             return ''
00027         else:
00028             return inventoryItem
00029         
00030     def getIfDefinedSpace(self, inventoryItem):
00031         if inventoryItem==None:
00032             return ''
00033         else:
00034             return inventoryItem+' '
00035         
00036     def write(self):
00037         '''write the potential'''
00038         #note gulp requires the middle atom be printed first
00039         return "three "\
00040             + self.writeInterIntra()\
00041             + self.writeBonding()\
00042             + linesep\
00043             + self.ii.atom2+' '\
00044             + self.ii.atom2Type+' '\
00045             + self.ii.atom1+' '\
00046             + self.ii.atom1Type+' '\
00047             + self.ii.atom3+' '\
00048             + self.ii.atom3Type+' '\
00049             + str(self.potential["k"])+' '\
00050             + str(self.potential["theta0"])+' '\
00051             + str(self.potential["cutoff"][0])+' '\
00052             + str(self.potential["cutoff"][1])+' '\
00053             + str(self.potential["cutoff"][2])+' '\
00054             + self.getFlag(self.ii.kFit)\
00055             + self.getFlag(self.ii.theta0Fit)\
00056             + linesep
